properties.areaDesc: Helena and Townsend Ranger Districts of the Helena National Forest
properties.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 31 at 3:28AM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 118.

* WINDS...Southwest 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 60 mph.

* IMPACTS...Increased grassland fire danger in places where there
is no snow cover.
properties.instruction:
A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions
are possible. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity,
and warm temperatures will create high fire growth potential.

Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these
areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

NWSheadline: FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 118
